headline: IT Coordinator II at World Bank Group

defaultPosition.description:
ï§	Serves as the primary point of contact on all matters related to hardware, software, and communications support for the department.
ï§	Troubleshoots computer problems with users in specified areas.
ï§	Installs, configures, and tests applications of hardware to meet organization and user requirements.
ï§	Installs, configures, and tests applications of software to meet organization and user requirements.
ï§	Makes recommendations for appropriate hardware/software for users.
ï§	Uses the âRemedyâ call tracking system to track work and analyze reports to identify problem areas and training opportunities.
ï§	Attends expert training when required and maintain a working knowledge of the IT trends in the business relevant to supporting the WBG standards.
ï§	Assists in departmental moves of IT hardware and communications.
ï§	Works closely with other IT support elements (such as ITS IT Client Services, IT Service Desk, and Mobile Kiosk).
ï§	Maintains a proper inventory of all IT related equipment and software, which is reported to CIT on a quarterly basis.
ï§	Assists in the decision making/planning process of IT needs at the beginning/end of each fiscal year.
ï§	Participates in the evaluation and piloting of new products and services (both hardware and software).
ï§	Provides IT training for staff members, particularly for newly hired staff.
ï§	Administers WB information security standards, including requesting IT accounts (Notes and Windows), SecurIDs, and remote connectivity accounts.
ï§	Coordinates with Bankâs Telecom Service unit to set up, transfer, and discontinue voice and data communication for the staff in the office and at home for Business Continuity designees.

positions.title: IT Coordinator II

positions.description:
ï§	Installs and supports PCs, laptops, printers, peripherals, and connected equipment in an IT Enterprise environment comprising thousands of users.
ï§	Provides end-user software and hardware troubleshooting and support in-person or over the phone.
ï§	Upgrades user computer systems ensuring no data loss.
ï§	Works independently in a customer environment.
ï§	Engages engineers from multiple teams.
ï§	Applies basic diagnostic techniques to identify problems, investigate causes, and recommend solutions.
ï§	Provides network configuration and troubleshooting techniques such as TCP/IP, WINS, DHCP and DNS within Windows- 7, Windows 8 operating system and Windows 10 and MACs.
ï§	Provides training to agency staff, as required.
ï§	Performs imaging (new and re-imaging) while safeguarding customer files and profiles; also testing laptop and desktop computers.
ï§	Applies basic troubleshooting skills to identify and resolve network printing issues and protocols issues related to network printing in windows 7 & 10 print server environment.
ï§	Provides support for Apple MAC computers, installs, configure and troubleshoot.
ï§	Supports Microsoft software packages to include Microsoft Office 2010, and other commonly used desktop related applications.
ï§	Communicates in writing via Service Now, in order to design, document, install and maintain complex IT systems.
ï§	Provides guidance and exchange of information with technical and non-technical people.
ï§	Conducts usability testing to improve user experience, enhance, maintain, and troubleshoot application requests including performance, capacity, availability, serviceability and recoverability.
ï§	Supports system resources including performance, capacity, availability, serviceability, and recoverability to ensure the delivery of IT services.
ï§	Ensures security compliance by reviewing network permissions and access to systems while providing account maintenance.
ï§	Communicates complex technical requirements to non-technical personnel.
positions.title: System Administrator

positions.description:
â¢ Administering user passwords, password resets, and account unlocks through Active Directory for applications such as Symantec Endpoint Encryption, Remedy, Citrix XenApp client, DOJConnect, and user JCON network accounts
â¢ Creating numerous incidents for issues related to JCON Top Secret and Secret systems as well as JABS (Joint Automated Booking System)
â¢ Setting up walk-in appointments and troubleshooting client laptop password sync issues with users and remote access
â¢ Logging 30-40 incident tickets through Remedy for all user calls and escalations
â¢ Troubleshooting various application issues for customers by using LANDesk remote tool to run gpupdates and numerous repairs
â¢ Installing different applications submitted by request from users via Remote Desktop Connection onto their desktops
positions.title: Proprietary Systems Specialist 1

positions.description:
Administered user passwords, password resets, and account unlocks through Novell Console One for applications such as CHRIS, Remedy, Dolphin, Safeboot, RSA
â¢ Troubleshoot various application issues for customers by administrating zen cleanup utility
â¢ Distributed numerous applications to customers per their request
â¢ Created 30-40 incidents, service requests, and work orders per week through Remedy
â¢ Participated in SOS (Service on Site) throughout Census for hands on experience with customers in numerous divisions
â¢ Associated various applications to users for install on their PCâs
â¢ Granted temporary administrator rights to customers to install and uninstall software
â¢ Trained and educated customers on different processes and procedures in relation to the IT Service Desk
positions.title: Help Desk Technician 1

positions.description:
â¢         Administered user passwords and password resets through Active Directory for applications such as Lawson, SharePoint and Marketron
â¢         Created and modifying user email accounts through Exchange Management Console
â¢         Completed SARFs (System Access Request Approval) for new hires into the company and existing employees who need account modifications
â¢         Replaced ink and toner cartridges for hp LaserJet printer models 4600n, 4014n, 4700n, 3250, 4250n
â¢         Ran full and quick virus scans on user PCâs using McAfee
â¢         Re-imaged and setting up brand new hp PCâs for current employees
â¢         Created 30-40 work orders per week through Track-It for all of the customers that I help
â¢         Helped users to setup their smart phones in order to send and receive emails from the Exchange server
positions.title: Help Desk Intern
